text: With less than a week until Prince Harry weds Meghan Markle, Lifetime adapted the couple's love story into a film aptly titled Harry & Meghan : A Royal Romance. Airing last night, the movie depicted the relationship timeline of Harry and Meghan â€” from the factual public moments and milestones to the probably less accurate ( and more dramatic ) behind - the - scenes love story. While the movie did include real life events from Meghan and Harry's relationship ( including their first blind date and whisking away to Botswana ), there were also some... ahem... harder - to - believe plot - lines thrown in as well.
